title: NASA, NOAA to Announce 2022 Global Temperatures, Climate Conditions
summary: Climate researchers from NASA and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) will release their annual assessments of global temperatures and discuss the major climate trends of 2022 during a media briefing at 11 a.m. EST Thursday, Jan. 12.

title: Astronomers celebrate performance of JWST
summary: Six months after the release of the first science images from the James Webb Space Telescope, astronomers and NASA officials say the observatory continues to exceed expectations while providing lessons for future space telescopes.

title: Even before Monday’s launch failure, Virgin Orbit’s finances were dismal
summary: Some financial analysts believe the company will run out of money in March.

title: Capella Space raises $60 million from fund run by billionaire entertainment exec Thomas Tull
summary: San Francisco-based satellite imagery specialist Capella Space raised $60 million in fresh capital, the company announced on Tuesday.

title: OneWeb two launches away from going global after SpaceX mission
summary: OneWeb is now just two launches away from being able to provide broadband globally after SpaceX sent its latest batch of satellites to orbit Jan. 9.
